title: Upset SZN: Game 1 Shockers and Not-So-Shockers | Heat Check
description:
The 2019 NBA playoffs are finally here! The first round kicked off with some surprising upsets (2:53), most notably the Brooklyn Nets defeating the Philadelphia 76ers (29:55) and the Orlando Magic edging out the Toronto Raptors (57:16).

Host: John Gonzalez
Guests: Justin Verrier, Spike Eskin, Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
